Sorry, attached to the wrong defect.

Bianca, do you know if this is still an issue; I have not yet had a chance to 
reproduce on Linux and if you had everything set-up (with the latest 4.0 
builds) I was going to ask if you could it test is quickly to see if its still 
broken.  If not, its okay, I will get to reproduce it probably on 6/16/2005 
and fix it if still broken.

I tried to recreate this problem using Eclipse 3.1 RC2 with TPTP 4.0 build of 
June 17, 2005 on Red Hat Linux (RHEL).

I ran a URLTest, JUnit test and Manual test and was able to open the execution 
history and view all the events with no problem. 

This bug has been fixed either directly or indirectly and is no longer a 
problem.

Closing by default since not closed by the originator in the 7+ months since being resolved.  

Please reopen if the issue is still present in the latest TPTP release or the resolution is not correct.
